XI.i.1.D.1.f
.
Processing an Automated EP 130 Based on an SSA DMF Match
When a Social Security death master file (DMF) identifies that a non-Veteran beneficiary is deceased, the system will automatically
establish an EP 130 with the claim label
PMC-Social Security Match
suspend the award, and
send a notification letter to beneficiary.
Follow Steps 2 through 6 in
M21-1, Part XI, Subpart i, 1.D.1.b
to process the EP.
Reference
:Â  For more information on processing a DMF match with SSA, see
M21-1, Part, XIV, 2.B
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section D  - General Procedures for Non-Veteran Beneficiary Notice of Death (NOD) Processing
citation: Part XI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section D
